description: Adds a member to a group within the specified identity store.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1098.001 - Account Manipulation: Additional Cloud Credentials

incidents.description: Tales from the cloud trenches: The Attacker doth persist too much, methinks

securityImplications: Attackers might use AddMemberToGroup to add compromised or malicious users to groups with elevated privileges, allowing them to manipulate access controls and maintain persistence in the environment.
